H0.text: Growing food is helped by refrigerators, which were invented to keep food cold.

H1.text: Cleaning food is helped by refrigerators, which were invented to keep food cold.

H2.text: Keeping food dry is helped by refrigerators, which were invented to keep food cold.

H3.text: Keeping food fresh is what refrigerators were invented to achieve by keeping food cold.

A4.text: The low temperature reduces the reproduction rate of bacteria, so the refrigerator lowers the rate of spoilage.

A5.text: The refrigerator allows the modern household to keep food fresh for longer than before.
